title: Lab Engineer- Lab Operations, Project Kuiper
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Implement and maintain automated test systems and frameworks.
- Perform hardware/software integration and troubleshooting on the manufacturing floor.
- Configure and integrate test equipment with automation systems.
- Set up and maintain automated testing platforms.
- Manage version control and change management processes.
- Provide technical support and training for automation users.
- Create documentation for automated systems and procedures.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 1+ years in consumer electronics lab environments.
- Bachelor's degree in relevant engineering or computer science.
- Experience in software QA testing and writing test plans.
- Familiarity with Linux or Unix environments.
- Experience with consumer hardware or software products.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- TestStand and LabVIEW for automated testing.
- CI/CD pipelines for automation tools.
- Jenkins for build environments.

- Experience with consumer hardware or software products.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**

- CI/CD pipelines for automation tools.
- Jenkins for build environments.

title: Sr. Applied Scientist, AGI Info
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Lead a team to improve RAG applications.
- Develop novel retrieval and ranking models.
- Partner with engineering to enhance model performance.
- Create science roadmaps for web search components.
- Publish research and engage with academic communities.
- Coach and develop junior scientists.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 3+ years of machine learning model experience.
- PhD or Master’s with 6+ years applied research.
- Proficient in Java, C++, Python, or similar.
- Experience with large-scale machine learning systems.
- Familiarity with corporate research settings.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Neural deep learning methods.
- Modeling tools: R, scikit-learn, TensorFlow.
- Large-scale distributed systems: Hadoop, Spark.

- Modeling tools: R, scikit-learn, TensorFlow.
- Large-scale distributed systems: Hadoop, Spark.

title: Applied Scientist, Books Core Recommendations
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Collaborate with scientists, engineers, and business partners.  
• Analyze customer behavior and product relationships.  
• Develop and maintain recommendation models.  
• Assist in running A/B tests on the retail website.  
• Improve Amazon's recommendation systems using advanced techniques.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• PhD or Master's degree with 4+ years experience.  
• Proficient in Java, C++, Python, or similar languages.  
• Experience in algorithms, data structures, or data mining.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Natural Language Processing (NLP)  
• Reinforcement Learning (RL)  
• Deep learning and graph networks

title: Applied Scientist, AGI Info - Web Information Systems
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop and deploy scalable algorithms for web search technology.
- Conduct experiments and analyze results to inform future work.
- Collaborate with engineers to implement innovations in production.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 3+ years of experience in building business application models.
- PhD or Master's with 4+ years in CS, CE, or ML.
- Proficiency in Java, C++, Python, or similar languages.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Information retrieval and ranking algorithms.
- Machine learning models for search and recommendations.
- Unix/Linux environments and high-performance computing.

- Proficiency in Java, C++, Python, or similar languages.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Information retrieval and ranking algorithms.
- Machine learning models for search and recommendations.
- Unix/Linux environments and high-performance computing.

title: Senior Software Development Engineer, Amazon Ads
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Partner with teams to build scalable ad-serving solutions.  
• Drive design, development, and improvement of ad-serving systems.  
• Simplify systems, reduce costs, and improve reliability.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 6+ years of professional software development experience.  
• 5+ years of programming in at least one language.  
• Experience leading design or architecture of systems.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Modern programming languages (Java, C++, C#).  
• Experience with distributed systems in UNIX environments.  
• Familiarity with full software development life cycle.

title: Sr. Software Engineer (ML), AGI Foundations
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Lead development of novel algorithms for LLM training.  
• Collaborate with Applied Scientists on fine-tuning experiments.  
• Work in Agile/Scrum to deliver high-quality software.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 5+ years of software development experience.  
• 5+ years of programming in at least one language.  
• Experience mentoring or leading engineering teams.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine Learning and AI solutions.  
• Large Language Models (LLM).  
• Agile/Scrum methodologies.

title: Salesforce Engineer , Project Kuiper
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Design and architect business workflows for various management processes.
- Implement solutions using Salesforce technologies like APEX and Service Cloud.
- Monitor performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize system configurations.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent.
- 4+ years of software development experience.
- 2+ years of Salesforce Development experience with Apex and APIs.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Salesforce platform, including APEX and Lightning components.
- Deployment technologies like SFDX, Copado, and Gearset.
- Order Management and Order Orchestration systems.

- Deployment technologies like SFDX, Copado, and Gearset.
- Order Management and Order Orchestration systems.

title: Security Engineer II, Amazon Security
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop software proof-of-concepts in Golang, Python, and Javascript.  
- Create and maintain threat models for software projects.  
- Conduct manual and automated secure code reviews.  
- Develop security automation tools and provide security training.  
- Independently solve complex security problems and influence team processes.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience.  
- Minimum 3 years in security engineering or related fields.  
- Experience in threat modeling, secure coding, and cloud security.  
- Strong application security background and excellent communication skills.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Golang, Python, Javascript for software development.  
- Security engineering, system and network security protocols.  
- AWS architecture and security solutions.

title: RF Sys Dev Engineer , Plexus Lab
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Design, build, and maintain lab infrastructure for RF testing.
- Integrate and support RF devices and testing equipment.
- Liaise between software and hardware teams for testing environments.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 2+ years in software development and test lab support.
- Experience with Linux-based systems and computer networking.
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- RF testing equipment (VSA, VSG, GNSS simulators).
- Automated testing tools and frameworks.
- Programming languages: C++, Python, Java, Golang.

title: SAP Integration Developer, Kuiper
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Design and review integration architecture for SAP ERP applications.
- Develop complex integrations with internal and external systems.
- Lead integration best practices and production support for failures.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience required.
- 6+ years of SAP experience, including middleware systems.
- 2+ years of SAP ABAP development experience.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- SAP CPI, SAP PO, ABAP Proxies, and Web Services.
- Experience with EDI integrations for Supply Chain.
- Familiarity with AWS integration options and SAP BTP.
